# Id - Description
#
AD  - address
AUI - authorization information
CCD - charge time
CCP - channel calibration parameters
CD  - channel definition
CE  - coded element
CF  - coded element with formatted values
CK  - composite ID with check digit
CN  - composite ID number and name
CNE - coded with no exceptions
CNN - composite ID number and name (special DT for NDL)
CP  - composite price
CQ  - composite quantity with units
CSU - channel sensitivity/units
CWE - coded with exceptions
CX  - extended composite ID with check digit
DDI - daily deductible
DIN - activation date
DLD - discharge location
DLN - driver's license number
DLT - delta check
DR  - date/time range
DTN - Day Type and Number
ED  - encapsulated data
EI  - entity identifier
EIP - parent order
ELD - error
FC  - financial class
FN  - familiy name
FT  - formatted text data
HD  - hierarchic designator
JCC - job code/class
LA1 - Location with address information (variant 1)
LA2 - Location with address information (variant 2)
MA  - multiplexed array
MO  - money
MOC - Charge To Practise
MOP - money or percentage
MSG - Message Type
NA  - numeric array
NDL - observing practitioner
NM  - numeric
NR  - Wertebereich
OCD - occurence
OSD - order sequence
OSP - occurence span
PCF - Pre-certification required
PI  - person identifier
PIP - Privileges
PL  - person location
PLN - Practitioner ID Numbers
PN  - person name
PPN - performing person time stamp
PRL - parent result link
PT  - processing type
PTA - Policy Type
QIP - query input parameter list
QSC - query selection criteria
RCD - row column definition
RFR - reference range
RI  - repeat interval
RMC - Room Coverage
RP  - reference pointer
SAD - street address
SCV - scheduling class value pair
SI  - sequence ID
SN  - structured numeric
SPD - Specialty
SPS - specimen source
SRT - sort order
ST  - string data
TN  - telephone number
TQ  - timing quantity
TS  - time stamp
TX  - text data
UVC - Value code and amount
VH  - visiting hours
VID - version identifier
VR  - value qualifier
WVI - channel identifier
WVS - waveform source
XAD - extended address
XCN - extended composite ID number and name for persons
XON - extended composite name and identification number for organizations
XPN - extended person name
XTN - extended telecommunication number
